```{r }
myttest <- function(data,x)
{
  #Detect the type of var
  if(is.numeric(data[[x]]))
  {
    #Build variables x and y
    a <- data[[x]][data$COVCLINTRIAL=='No']
    b <- data[[x]][data$COVCLINTRIAL=='Yes']
    #Apply the test
    Res <- t.test(a,b)
    print(Res)
  }
}

```
